project_descr: Sub-national Capacity Strengthening for Monitoring Socio-economic Development Plan Implementation in Thua Thien Hue Province

outputs.output_descr:
Sub-National Capacity Strengthening for Monitoring Socio-economic development planning (SEDP) Project (SCSM project) is aimed at strengthening capacity at sub-national levels in Thua Thien Hue province for the development, piloting and adaptation of a suitable system for development-result based, participatory and gender sensitive monitoring annual and 5-year SEDP implementation. The output targets will include:
(i) Monitoring and Evaluation (M&E) capacity strengthening needs assessed, M&E indicators and baselines developed/set 
(ii) Roles of different organizations clarified and institutional capacity assessed
(iii) Preliminary M&E framework/guidelines developed and draft improved by the PPC
(iv) Piloting, field testing and validating M&E framework/guidelines
(v) M&E framework guidelines finalized
(v) Lessons learnt and results of pilot gathered, analysed and shared for replication.
